hibernate-mapping.query: from Task t order by t.lastUpdateDate asc
from Task t where t.nodeId=:nodeId order by t.lastUpdateDate asc
from Task t where t.nodeId=:nodeId and t.ttype =:taskType order by t.lastUpdateDate asc
select id from Task t where t.nodeId=:nodeId order by t.lastUpdateDate asc
